item.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these 3 stocks for long-term investors

item.title: Elliott sees opportunities to create value at warehouse REIT Rexford Industrial
item.description: Rexford's premium assets, its consolidation in the REIT industry and discounted valuation makes the company a natural acquisition candidate.
